item.description:
THE FIRE PIT
IS LIT!!

Friends of Lake
Pocotopaug to Raffle
$10,000.00 CASH

The Friends of Lake Pocotopaug,a volunteer,non profit organization in East Hampton are in the midst of their major fundraiser for this year.

The group is raffling...

$10,000.00 cash as first prize.
Additional Prizes
1st Place Prize - $10,000.00
2nd Place Prize - $3,000.00 Cash
3rd Place Prize - $1,000.00 Shaw’s Gift Certificate
4th Place Prize - $500.00 Angelico’s Lake House Gift Certificate.

The drawing will be held at Angelico's Lake House on August 15th in conjunction with the 5th Annual Capt’n Grizzy Showboat Parade. Raffle tickets can be purchased at Angelico’s Lake House Restaurant (860-267-1276),

5th ANNUAL
“Capt’n Grizzy Showboat Parade”
Saturday, August 15th
(Rain Date Aug 16)
Join us this Saturday for the 5th ANNUAL Boat Parade around the lake.

Last years Parade was the highlight of the summer events on
the lake. Over 50 boats were decorated and participated in this event.
This year’s Parade is expected to easily exceed that number. Boats will rendezvous
at the Lake House docks at 2:00 p.m. The boats will then be led on a
tour around the lake. The flotilla will pass by the reviewing stand at former
Gov and Mrs. Nikki O’Neill’s residence where a distinguished group of
judges will review the “fleet”. Trophies & prizes will be awarded for the most
originally decorated boats.

At the conclusion of the tour the boats will raft up at the Lake House docks or at the Happiest Paddler docks and the party will begin at the Lake House. Music will be provided by Basically Blues and the
Johnny 5 Band. Resident Lake House MC “Red Mac” (East Hampton’s own Red McKinney) will MC the event.

Throughout the day there will be prizes,give a ways, and raffles, along with food and drink specials.The festivities will culminate with the raffle drawing for $10,000.00 Cash First Prize.

You don’t need a boat to enjoy the fun. Everyone is welcome to this Great Party. You can view the flotilla from the shores of the Lake House or you can just chill in the Beer Garden. But whatever you do, DON’T miss the
fun….and it will be FUN!! This will be the biggest party of the summer at the Lake House and everyone is welcome!!


PRINCESS OF THE LAKE PAGEANT SCHEDULE

1:45 p.m.
BOATS RENDEZVOUS AT ANGELICO’S LAKE HOUSE DOCKS
2:00 p.m.
BOAT PARADE BEGINS
3:00 p.m.
BOATS RETURN TO LAKE HOUSE OR HAPPIEST PADDLER
3:00 p.m.
“BASICALLY BLUES BAND” BEGINS
6:00 p.m.
$10,000 RAFFLE DRAWING
7:00 p.m.
“JOHNNY 5 BAND” BEGINS

So come on over and join us for a day of fun...the parade of boats...music...bar specials...dancing...great company. What's better than that?

SEE YOU THEN!!!
item.name: 5th Annual "Capt'n Grizzy" Showboat Parade
